description: Add tags to a CloudFront resource. For more information, see Tagging a distribution in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.description: An ARN of a CloudFront resource.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A complex type that contains zero or more Tag elements. Items (list) --- A complex type that contains Tag elements. (dict) --- A complex type that contains Tag key and Tag value. A string that contains Tag key. The string length should be between 1 and 128 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @. Value (string) --- A string that contains an optional Tag value. The string length should be between 0 and 256 characters. : / = + @.

nested_params.name: Items
nested_params.description: A complex type that contains Tag elements.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A string that contains Tag key. The string length should be between 1 and 128 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A string that contains an optional Tag value. The string length should be between 0 and 256 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @.
